channel.title: Comments on: Daring Bakers Challenge December 2011

item.title: By: Nic@diningwithastud
item.dc:creator: Nic@diningwithastud
item.description: Sorry to hear you havent been feeling well. Look forward to the belated bread post :)
item.content:encoded: Sorry to hear you havent been feeling well. Look forward to the belated bread post ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: bake in paris
item.dc:creator: bake in paris
item.description: Happy New Year, Anita! Best wishes for you in 2012!
item.content:encoded: Happy New Year, Anita! Best wishes for you in 2012!

item.title: By: Beta Gal
item.dc:creator: Beta Gal
item.description: Glad you're feeling better. Good luck with the sour dough.
item.content:encoded: Glad you’re feeling better. Good luck with the sour dough.

item.title: By: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.dc:creator: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.description: Good luck with the new sourdough. I'm sure it's worth waiting for.
item.content:encoded: Good luck with the new sourdough. I’m sure it’s worth waiting for.

item.title: By: Carol Anne
item.dc:creator: Carol Anne
item.description: Oh dear - I hope you are feeling a lot better. As someone who always falls sick at this time of year, I sympathise! I also had the same problem with my starter going mouldy, I hope your next try works out for you.
item.content:encoded: Oh dear – I hope you are feeling a lot better. As someone who always falls sick at this time of year, I sympathise! I also had the same problem with my starter going mouldy, I hope your next try works out for you.

item.title: By: marcellina
item.dc:creator: marcellina
item.description: Oh what a shame! I'm glad you are well now. This is certainly a challenge where are the planets need to be aligned, so to speak!
item.content:encoded: Oh what a shame! I’m glad you are well now. This is certainly a challenge where are the planets need to be aligned, so to speak!

item.title: By: Sarah
item.dc:creator: Sarah
item.description: Sorry to hear that you have been unwell and hope it didn't interfere with your Christmas cooking! Looking forward to seeing your bread soon.
item.content:encoded: Sorry to hear that you have been unwell and hope it didn’t interfere with your Christmas cooking! Looking forward to seeing your bread soon.

item.title: By: Jeanne
item.dc:creator: Jeanne
item.description: I hope you're feeling better soon! And will look forward to seeing your sourdough bread! I know how tough it is to miss a challenge. ;)
item.content:encoded: I hope you’re feeling better soon! And will look forward to seeing your sourdough bread! I know how tough it is to miss a challenge. ðŸ˜‰
